aka: There Are Not Thirty-Six Ways of Showing a Man Getting on a Horse

cast.name: 拉乌尔·沃尔什 Raoul Walsh

writer.name: 玛丽娜·索拉兹 Malena Solarz
尼古拉斯·祖克菲尔德 Nicolás Zukerfeld

director.name: 尼古拉斯·祖克菲尔德 Nicolás Zukerfeld

this_title: No existen treinta y seis maneras de mostrar cómo un hombre se sube a un caballo
trans_title: 表现一个人骑在马上的方式不只有三十六种
There Are Not Thirty-Six Ways of Showing a Man Getting on a Horse
introduction: Nicolás Zukerfeld’s third feature is a wry, surprising work of filmmaking-as-criticism that begins as a kind of supercut of moments from the work of pantheon Hollywood auteur Raoul Walsh. This rhythmically entrancing parade of images traces a mysterious and amusing arc across the director’s vast oeuvre—but at the halfway mark, the film reinvents itself as an idiosyncratic, essayistic investigation into memory, cinema, and their shared mutability. There Are Not Thirty-Six Ways… reimagines cinema as a medium for the generation and transmission of ideas, and the results are by turns humorous, stimulating, and thrilling.
chinese_title: 表现一个人骑在马上的方式不只有三十六种
foreign_title: No existen treinta y seis maneras de mostrar cómo un hombre se sube a un caballo
